title: Zimbabwe Exchange Granted “Interim Relief,” Ban Appeal Still Ongoing – Bitcoin News (press release)
content: Bitcoin News (press release) Zimbabwe Exchange Granted Interim Relief, Ban Appeal Still OngoingBitcoin News (press release)Despite reports of the Zimbabwe High Court s reversal of the Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe s (RBZ) recently issued cryptocurrency ban, the country s leading bitcoin exchange, Golix, is yet to restore trading on its platform. In an email recently sent to ...  Cryptocurrency exchange expands to Kenya and Uganda after the high court lifts ban.Cryptoline News (blog)
